title: Not queer enough? - Bisexual mental health
text: In this page you’ll find soon results from my master’s thesis.

title: Hello, Quarto
text:
Meet the penguins

The penguins data from the palmerpenguins package contains size measurements for 344 penguins from three species observed on three islands in the Palmer Archipelago, Antarctica.
The plot below shows the relationship between flipper and bill lengths of these penguins.

title: Home
text:
Hiya,
My name is Vic Nagel (they/them), I will graduate from Sciences Po Paris in June 2024 within the School of Research - Sociology.
I am interested in sociology of health, of sexuality, and of social inequalities. I have written a dissertation titled “Not queer enough? Stigma within lesbian, gay and bisexual populations - A mixed-method study”, supervised by Martin Aranguren.
I will present my research at the International Conference on Social Stress Research next June in Portland (OR, USA), as well as at the Summer school for mixed methods in Rennes (France).
You can find my CV in French here.
